changes.description: Fixed AMD GPU not being detected properly. Which was causing issues with GPU encoding.
Fixed UI issues and auto updater issues.
Fixed auto update system in preparation for .exe releases
Fixed AMD GPU not being detected properly.
Fixed map event pins not clearing properly.
Fixed video auto playing when paused and using seeking functions.
Fixed playback bar not updating after seeking while paused.
Revamped Diagnostic Support System to not rely on Third Party Services and added additional measures to protect user diagnostic data.
Reduced PII & not helpful support diagnostic data.
Updated default branch to main.
Added warning if no GPU is detected for export telemetry overlay toggle.
Cleaned up dead code & comments.
Removed legacy drag & drop code.
Removed some keybinds in favor of customizable keyboard shortcuts.
Added ability to check for updates without having to relaunch app.
Added ability to swap between Main and Dev-SEI Branch. Dev-SEI is now used for Beta.
Changed version naming to match year and week similar to Tesla's version naming.
Changed the camera export layout to match HW3/HW4 camera count.
Fixed playback bar jumping around to a different spot than selected.
Added new user welcome guide

versions.title: Add Classic Layout Setting & Ability to Minimize Export Modal during export

changes.description: Added ability to switch between Classic and Modern layout styles
Added ability to minimize export modal during export and see progress on a floating notification
Fixed a rare issue where updates would sometimes not work properly
Added a new diagnostics button to the settings modal that will generate a shareable id to share with the Sentry Six team for debugging purposes.

versions.title: Prevents modal from closing during update

changes.description: Prevents the update modal from closing during an update if the user attempts to close it.
Fixed changelogs not loading properly. Updated to grab changelog from github repo instead of locally due to inital testing..
Improved video export marker UX and layout
Fixed rare issue of export cancellation not working properly
Fixed FFmpeg memory leak
Improved GPU encoding & added HEVC encoder detection
Significantly reduced export time when Dashboard Overlay is enabled
Added ability for Maximum Quality export to be done with GPU if HEVC is available
Overhaul of Settings & Export UI to improve tidiness and match the design language between the modals
Added changelog viewer in Settings
New version-based update system with semantic versioning
Inital Release
